snippet: AT&T has agreed to buy DirecTV for $48.5 billion. | AstraZeneca has rejected Pfizer’s “final” offer. | Google may buy the video game service Twitch. | Deutsche Bank plans to raise fresh capital.
abstract: AT&T has agreed to buy DirecTV for $48.5 billion. | AstraZeneca has rejected Pfizer’s “final” offer. | Google may buy the video game service Twitch. | Deutsche Bank plans to raise fresh capital.
